Verses: 1 ummaith Thudhikkirom, Dhevane, Ummaith Thudhikkirom; Umadhu Naamam Sameebamaayirukkiradhendru Umadhu Adhisayamaana Kiriyaigal Arivikkiradhu.
3 boomiyaanadhu Adhin Ellaak Kudigalodum Karaindhupogiradhu; Adhin Thoongalai Naan Nilainiruththugiren. (selaa.)
4 veembukkaararai Nokki, Veembupesaadheyungal Endrum; Dhunmaarkkarai Nokki, Kombai Uyarththaadhirungal Endrum Sonnen.
5 ungal Kombai Uyaramaai Uyarththaadhirungal; Irumaappulla Kazhuththudaiyavargalaaip Pesaadhirungal.
6 kizhakkilum Merkilum Vanaandhara Thisaiyilumirundhu Jeyam Varaadhu.
7 dhevane Niyaayaadhibadhi; Oruvanaith Thaazhththi, Oruvanai Uyarththugiraar.
8 kalangip Pongugira Madhubaanaththinaal Niraindha Paaththiram Karththarudaiya Kaiyilirukkiradhu, Adhilirundhu Vaarkkiraar; Boomiyilulla Dhunmaarkkar Yaavarum Adhin Vandalgalai Urinjik Kudippaargal.
9 naano Endrendraikkum Idhai Ariviththu, Yaakkobin Dhevanaik Keerththanampannuven.
10 dhunmaarkkarudaiya Kombugalaiyellaam Vettippoduven; Needhimaanudaiya Kombugalo Uyarththappadum.
